title: Is safety ‘dead’ at xAI?
description: Elon Musk is “actively” working to make xAI’s Grok chatbot “more unhinged, according to a former employee.
content: Elon Musk is “actively” working to make xAI’s Grok chatbot “more unhinged, according to a former employee.
